text: Acton is a town in the U.S. state of Massachusetts. It is 21 miles away from Boston. ==Other websites== *Official Town Website *Acton Public Schools and Acton-Boxborough Regional School District *Community Profile *Acton Water District Website *Acton Memorial Library *The Discovery Museums *Theatre III *Open Door Theater *Early Acton History Category:Towns in Massachusetts
title: Acton, Massachusetts
